text: @SpeakerPelosi Self-congratulatory propaganda today in Trump's press briefing on the coronavirus. Insistance that he took it serious immediately is a lie. Disappointed that the press failed to reveal he had cut 80% of CDC budget in 2018, curtailing their ability to operate & foresee a problem.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
